markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 9" pfs="Standard">
[Untwisting Iron Pillar](/Spells.aspx?ID=1254)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon the earth and your ki to shield you from your enemies. You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374)).
name: Untwisting Iron Pillar

text: Untwisting Iron Pillar Single Action Source Impossible Lands pg. 223 Cast verbal Duration 5 rounds --- You call upon the earth and your ki to shield you from your enemies. You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except adamantine).
